column4: My graphics performance compared to windows is very bad in Linux. For example java performance is halfed in comparison to Windows. I have latest nVidia drivers installed as well. Does anyone have any suggestions?
since we can't get hold off properitory drivers from Nvidia your video preformance may sufure a bit
Ok I just wanted to be sure i have the 'best' perf allowed to me by closed source devs...
usually my nvidia card runs hot have two fans in case for just this???
